title: Carcass - Surgical Steel (2013) [FLAC] {Japan QATE-10043}
description:
Surgical Steel is the sixth full-length album by British death metal band Carcass. The album is scheduled to be released on 13 September 2013 in Europe, 16 September in the UK, and 17 September in North America, via Nuclear Blast.Trooper Entertainment has already released the album in Japan with two bonus tracks; 'A Wraith In The Apparatus' and 'Intensive Battery Brooding'.

Surgical Steel will be their first album since Swansong (1996). The album will feature the first songs Carcass has recorded since reforming in 2007. Surgical Steel will be their first album with drummer Dan Wilding.

Japanese Edition + 2 Bonus Tracks
